title: Are these Britain's worst drivers? Shocking dashcam footage shows absolute carnage on roads
text:
Are these Britain's worst drivers? Shocking dashcam footage shows absolute carnage on roads Footage shows cars being cut off, traffic signals seemingly non-existent and juggernauts dodged on the motorway Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Dashcam compilation shows of the worst UK drivers Share this video Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Shocking dashcam footage of some of the UK's worst drivers show cars being cut off, motorbikers ignored and juggernauts dodged on the motorway. 
The compilation released by garage price comparison site Book My Garage reveals the carnage on our roads . 
A hapless pedestrian can be seen running across the road for a bus without even casting a glance at the Mercedes that is inches from mowing him down. 
While, an MPV driving along a road mysteriously strays off course and ploughs into a parked car – giving a nasty shock to the stunned driver who was minding his own business inside it. 
Dashcam picked up an incredible final resting position of a car after it mounted a barrier on two wheels. Read More Hapless pedestrian inches from death as a Mercedes nearly mows him down (Photo: Book my Garage) MPV ploughs into parked car for no apparent reason (Photo: Book my Garage) Dashcam footage shows cars speeding along the motorway, cutting up others (Photo: Book my Garage) 
While a driver's quick reaction saves a deer wandering across a dark road at night. 
Drivers can be seen cutting up cars behind them and speeding as a white van driver speeds down the wrong side of the road around a traffic island in a desperate bid to overtake. White van astonishingly speeds down the wrong side of the road (Photo: Book my Garage) Bad driving nearly causes crash on motorway (Photo: Book my Garage) 
Book My Garage CEO Douglas Rotberg said: “While everyone enjoys watching these terrible displays of driving, they also illustrate the importance of dashcams. 
“If you get one mounted in your car, you are safe in the knowledge that you will have a recording of any reckless behaviour." Like us on Facebook
